summary: This mod adds a Necromancy college to the seas bordering Skyrim. The college is home to some very powerful and knowledgeable Necromancers. Requires DAWNGUARD. DRAGONBORN, and the newest UPDATE.
descriptionHtml:
: Description :
This mod adds a Necromancy college to the seas bordering Skyrim. The college is home to some very powerful and knowledgeable Necromancers. I created this mod with high hopes of it being a fully complete, quest included, special home and college, but sadly, I had too high hopes. I felt overwhelmed and gave up on it. I have the entire exterior and interior complete, there are no quests, there are special armors and weapons. I will add all of the NPC\'s I created, but they do nothing special. Requires DAWNGUARD. DRAGONBORN, and the newest UPDATE.

: Author Notes :
:- I am planning on updating this eventually, updating it with new spells, maybe a better boat system.

: Features :
:- New Faction Specific Weapons, Armor, and Clothing.
:- Full College

: Update Log :
:- Main File: Version 1.0
::- Contains Main Components, should include BSA File
:- Version 1.1 (v1.1)
::- Adds some new spells
::- Generic Improvements

: Layout :
:- Entryway
:- Snowshroud Citadel (Main Room)
:- Castle Labratory (Labratiry)
:- Training Foyer (Training Room)
:- Bunkhall (Living Quarters)
:- Archmage\'s Chamber (Leader\'s Bedroom)
:- Athenaeum (Library)
:- Castle Kitchen
:- Castle Forge

: Known Bugs :
:- None Yet
author: dmcthunder999
